Articles.Content:
Calling all budding filmmakers on here!

This is a thread to share your work, KSP related or otherwise, talk about it and critique other people's. Nothing too harsh please, this is meant to be a positive community where everyone can share their ideas and the stuff they do, no matter their skill level. 

I'll start off with the two proper things I've made so far. There's Superluminal, which was a film for my Fine Art course based around the theme of exploration (as a KSP player you can guess where I took that one ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif) ):

<iframe width="480" height="270" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/TsIq9Fmw4NQ?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>

And my most recent project which was basically the result of two people messing around with a camera for a day and then attempting to edit the results into something coherent:

<iframe width="480" height="270" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/Q0LzHFriqeI?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>

Not bad...

For a lunar surface, a location similar to Area-51 would have been more convincing..![:wink:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_wink.gif)
